text: What is actually wrong with suicide Aside from what it d do to my family  of course  People can t help but be disturbed by death and suicide and it devastated me to think of the pain it could cause others   But other than that  why live if I don t want to  Life is a constant struggle  it s not just difficult to be fulfilled  it s an uphill battle just to be alive on a day to day basis   I have some extreme mental illnesses  I don t know what I d be diagnosed as but therapy hasn t helped so far  I carry myself relatively well so my therapist doesn t really investigate or ask the difficult questions  I don t think she thinks there s anything wrong   But there is  objectively something wrong with me  I m not a happy person  I m in constant pain  And I m not a pleasant person to be around  I am irritable and moody  I am often in a terrible mood  I have a resting bitch face from all hell  I can have a short fuse with people  I don t keep plans But I care about people  So much  I just have the hardest time showing it  I struggle to express my pain in a way that people can understand   And it s getting worse  And I just don t think I want to continue a life where I will never be a normal  healthy  happy person  Because I never have been
summary: Suicide is a constant struggle for him. He has some extreme mental illnesses. He is irritable and moody, often in a terrible mood, has a resting bitch face and can have a short fuse with people. He doesn't keep plans and he doesn't express his pain in a way that people can understand.
